attributes.action: introduce MOT testing for Big Fast Tractors (BFTs).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The growth of BFTs has been rapid but there is no regulation with regard to their condition, ability to stop or steer,etc, as they get older.These vehicles are fast and massive especially when they lug large loads so we should act now before they age too much and start killing/injuring people.
